decision_conditions: The works specified in this application should only be carried out strictly in accordance with British Standard 3998: 2010 'Tree Work Recommendations'.
description:
450 Quercus robur - 120dbh - Lop by reducing to about 2m above main fork at 8m to create 2m knuckles and Ring bark tree to kill. Remove sucker and epicormic growth up to the base of the tree's crown. 
451 Quercus robur - 65dbh - Ring bark tree to kill. 
452 Quercus robur - 90dbh - Lop by: Reducing to about at 9m to create 2m knuckles and lob side limbs below leaving 2m knuckles 
453 Quercus robur - 90dbh - Reduce crown by 40%. Do not cut within 10cm of woodpecker holes
454 Quercus robur - 65dbh - Reduce crown by 40%. 
455- 68dbh - Lop by: Reducing to about at 8m to create 2m knuckles and lop any side limbs below leaving 2m knuckles
456- Multiple trees - fell to ground level: Oaks and Maple 19 marked with circles DBH: 4x - 10-15 4x - 20-25 8x - 26-30 3x - 35-40 (summary)
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
